    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        update() method of a player. First of all it checks your life status, if anyone in the range, then calls method move(), which checks if player can move or not, then system will render the player on current coordinates. Also this method updates fireballs status and can call shoot() method for fireball
        Specified by:
        update in class Mob
